description:
On the way to school, Chino notices something strange about Cocoa and learns that she has a high fever. Rize and Chiya come to visit, but her fever won`t go down. When night falls, Chino realizes they`re out of cold medicine and sets out alone to find some...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For You, I Can Sleep Late
Pour toi, je ferai la grasse matinée
君のためなら寝坊する
